
- Ninau Pane - A bitsy game made by Marina Diez 

# BITSY VERSION 4.6

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

DLG ITM_7

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG ITM_1
Foreigner, so you have arrived our crypt. Do you know who were these people? No, you don't. Our story? Our History? Well, it's something too long to put it down in a piece of stone, don't you think so? Please, find us. We are waiting for you. 

DLG ITM_2
This is a beautiful key. Oh, maybe it opens that big door. 

DLG ITM_3
I can feel the spirits in this room. 

DLG SPR_1
The statues are made on mud. This is perfectly polished. 

DLG ITM_4
This place is amazing. What are those buildings? 

DLG ITM_5
This is a stranger key. Have you tried to enter one of the buildings with this? 

DLG SPR_0
This statue is enormous. It seems a person from a mysterious civilization. 

DLG SPR_2
I'm the library guardian. These books are our most appreciated treasure. If your intention is damage them, we will place a hex on you. Don't be stupid. 

DLG SPR_3
Book 1: Our civilization was known as the "Kokua tribe". We used to help everyone who needed help. We lived in peace. Our village was prosperous and our people were happy. 

DLG SPR_4
Book 2: Our first queen, Hula Pua "The dancer flower" was blessed with the virtues of love and wisdom. Our religion was founded; a free cult which preached the love for our Nature & our brothers and sisters. 

DLG SPR_5
Book 3: Hula Pua decided instead of venerate gods, venerate books & that is the main reason of this library. The second reason is the love of our queen for stories, & her objective was to create a beautiful temple for these books you are reading now. 

DLG SPR_6
Book 4: But one day arrived to our village the emissary of a far kingdom, the kingdom of king John I. This kingdom and their people thought that their religion was the true one and their purpose was convert us or kill us. 

DLG SPR_7
"""
Book 4: Our negative provoked our enemies. We didn't want to fight. We tried to avoid a massacre. 
Hum... the next page is blank. 
"""

DLG SPR_8
There are no more books about the Kokua History in this bookcase. 

DLG ITM_6
A bowl with a message put on its reverse: venerate water as our mother and find us behind the big doors.

DLG ITM_7
The light fill this room as I was in the outside. 

DLG SPR_9
Here lies Hule Pua. Queen of Kokua tribe. Queen of queens. Lani Kolua. Hola Poalima. Moku Ipo. Moana Inoa. Himeni Ua. 

DLG SPR_a
"""
...: Hello, my name is Kupuna Kane. I never imagined that one of us would find our story. What is yours, son? What brings you to this enormous graveyard? 
Keiki: My name is Keiki. I found the entrance when I was a child, but my mother discovered me and in our village is forbidden to come here. We call this place "The cursed old lands". 
Kupuna Kane: "The cursed old lands"... Aren't you surprised for our incredibly physical similarity? 
Keiki: For some reason I feel peace in this place. I have not fear. I want to know... 
Kupuna Kane: And I want to tell you, son. I will tell you everything I know, but you must keep the secret for now. 
Keiki: I'll keep it, Kupuna Kane "Kau wela Wakea", the queen's Hula Pua father. 
"""

VAR a
42
